Array: * (It's a school report about\n  monster funerals.)
* Monster funerals,^05 technically\n  speaking,^05 are cool as heck.
* When monsters get old and\n  kick the bucket,^05 they turn\n  into dust.
* At funerals,^05 we take that\n  dust and spread it on that\n  person's favorite thing.
* Then their essence will live\n  on in that thing...
* Uhhh,^05 am I at the page\n  minimum yet?^05\n* I'm kinda sick of writing this.
* They made that sound\n  more cool than it\n  actually is,^05 faha...
